name: s3-lambda-csv-to-pdf-s3
description: A Serverless Application Repository Component for converting CSV files from one S3 bucket, to PDF files and into another S3 bucket.

scripts.package: aws cloudformation package --template-file template.yml --output-template-file output.yaml --s3-bucket app-repo-components
scripts.deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file output.yml --stack-name s3-lambda-csv-to-pdf-s3 --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM
scripts.qd: npm run package && npm run deploy

author: Aleksandar Simovic <alexander.simovic@gmail.com>
